description: Searches for entities of the specified type. You can search for entities in your namespace and the public namespace that you're tracking.

parameters.name: entityTypes
parameters.description: The entity types for which to search. (string) ---

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filter to apply to the search. Valid filters are NAME NAMESPACE, SEMANTIC_TYPE_PATH and REFERENCED_ENTITY_ID. REFERENCED_ENTITY_ID filters on entities that are used by the entity in the result set. For example, you can filter on the ID of a property that is used in a state. Multiple filters function as OR criteria in the query. Multiple values passed inside the filter function as AND criteria. (dict) --- An object that filters an entity search. Multiple filters function as OR criteria in the search. For example a search that includes a NAMESPACE and a REFERENCED_ENTITY_ID filter searches for entities in the specified namespace that use the entity specified by the value of REFERENCED_ENTITY_ID. name (string) --- The name of the entity search filter field. value (list) --- An array of string values for the search filter field. Multiple values function as AND criteria in the search. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the entity search filter field. REFERENCED_ENTITY_ID filters on entities that are used by the entity in the result set. For example, you can filter on the ID of a property that is used in a state.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: An array of string values for the search filter field. Multiple values function as AND criteria in the search.

nested_items.name: descriptions
nested_items.description: An array of descriptions for each entity returned in the search result.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the entity was created.

nested_items.name: definition
nested_items.description: The definition document of the entity.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to specify as nextToken when you request the next page of results.
